post_content_localized.en:
You will be treated to some unexpected fun when you check out these unusual tours in Manhattan.

Fun Tourist Attractions in Manhattan You Won't Want to Skip

Immerse yourself in insider information with The Wall Street Experience. Both entertaining, and informative, these tours provide a comprehensive and exclusive experience for Wall Street visitors. You can choose between two tours: The Financial Crisis Tour or the Wall Street Insider Tour.

Get a feel for authentic Brooklyn culture with the New York Gospel Walking Tour. A friendly and informative guide takes you through the heart of Brooklyn Heights to learn about the roots of African-American gospel culture. You also get to watch a live performance from a six-time Grammy winning gospel choir. These tours run on Sundays and your ticket price includes many free gifts.

There's nothing quite like this Interactive New York Sightseeing Experience. Hop on a double-decker bus known as THE RIDE to explore New York with a comedic host and non-stop theatre entertainment.

Plan Your Trip to Manhattan

If you're interested in checking out these unusual tours in Manhattan, why not make a weekend out of it? Consider staying with us at The Manhattan Club. We're a residential-style boutique hotel in the heart of New York City. Our convenient midtown Manhattan location and several amenities make our hotel an ideal place to rest-up during any New York visit.
